summary: Plans for a summer filled with fun and romance turn to terror for a group of young counselors.
cast: Jessica Morris|Peter Guillemette|Patrick Cavanaugh|Crystalle Ford|Michael Stone|Justin Ross Martin|Tracy Pacheco|Lindsey Leigh|David Smigelski|William Winter|Michael Prohaska|Jerry Richards|Bobby Stuart|Brian Messing|Ricky Courtney|Jason Gelber
director: Director: Ralph E. Portillo (as Ralph Portillo)
title: Campamento sangriento
